results.title: Simvastatin treatment promotes proliferation of human dental pulp stem cells via modulating PI3K/AKT/miR-9/KLF5 signalling pathway
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ serves as an effective therapeutic potential in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Stomatognathic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009057 @@@dental disease@@@ via alternating proliferation of dental pulp stem cells.
